body.description: Blended with ginger essential oil from Sri Lanka, birch bark, white willow extracts and Community Trade organic aloe vera, our lightweight Ginger Scalp Care Conditioner gently soothes the scalp and strengthens weak locks. Use with our iconic Ginger Scalp Care Shampoo for optimum results. Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Panthenol, Lecithin, Propylene Glycol, Parfum/Fragrance, Salix Alba Bark Extract/Willow Bark Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Linalool, Limonene, Betula Alba Bark Extract, Zingiber Officinale Root Oil/Ginger Root Oil, Citronellol, Citral. Massage into damp, clean hair. Rinse thoroughly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer!!! My scalp doesn't itch anymore!
reviews.reviewText: I am not one who washes my hair every day. It is more like once, maybe twice, a week. Every winter, I get a dry, itchy scalp, and I am constantly scratching my head to the point of dandruff or some kind of dermatitis that causes flakes in my hair. And every winter I try to find products to alleviate this issue. This year, I did a coconut oil treatment and while I waited, I went on Amazon and found this and the shampoo. After reading the reviews and doing some quick research, I decided to try it. It arrived the next evening. That was a couple of weeks ago. I have washed and conditioned my hair about three times with this product and it has made such a difference. I do not itch anymore. I am seeing less and less dandruff. The smell is a little different than I am used to, but it isn't unpleasant. Had I known about this, I would have tried it a long time ago. If you battle the same problems I do, just buy it. It's not too expensive and the relief I feel is sooo worth it!((I wrote the same review for the shampoo.))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t works for me
reviews.reviewText: It’s recommended by my friend but after all I can’t take it. I had oily hair so after I use it my hair got tangled. I am ok with all brand shampoo it’s won’t bring me any problem it’s doesn’t matter if I had use conditioner or not. But this time I purchase shampoo and conditioner at same time hopefully will works for me cause my friend said this ginger shampoo will reduce hair lost after using them. It’s totally opposite I lost more hair then before cause they all get tied. I am so mad about to cut my hair at time when I can’t brush them. I ask my son took the picture but he deleted it by accident . I already stopped using it. Will not recommending use them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product it’s so soft on your scalp but effectively cleaning! The smell is amazing I recommend it

reviews.reviewTitle: Affordable Luxury for Healthy Scalp and Hair!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried "The Body Shop Ginger Scalp Care Conditioner" and I'm delighted with the results. Not only does it leave my hair feeling incredibly soft and manageable, but it has also noticeably improved the health of my scalp. The soothing ginger formula works wonders, and I've seen a reduction in irritation and dryness.What's even better is that I found this gem at a more budget-friendly price compared to the actual Body Shop store. This makes it a win-win situation – I get to pamper my hair and scalp without breaking the bank.If you're looking for an effective and affordable solution for both your scalp and hair, "The Body Shop Ginger Scalp Care Conditioner" is definitely worth a try. It's a fantastic product that delivers results and savings!
Feels nice on the scalp and non irritating

reviews.reviewText: Could feel the difference after the very first use.
Me va muy bien. Tengo bastante pelo y me lo deja perfecto

Good value for a high end product. At around 700 rs for the shampoo and conditioner each, beats all of the other higher price range professional shampoo and conditioners. Very mild scent.Works well on both men and women (wife certified). Shampoo does not dry out your hair and conditioner works well too.Completely got rid of dandruff using this product.
